name: Alone in Space (itch) (FlyingIllustration)
description:
Alone in Space is an exploration game. 
You explore a spaceship as a small alien - find clues and information about the crew and how you arrived there.

Here you can see a bit more details about the project:
Project Thread on Twitter

Besides the story, it was a test of Unitys visual scripting tool BOLT, which I have been using for several years but never completely in a larger project.

In this prototype everything is implemented with BOLT:

Procedural walking animation
Inventory system
Dynamic camera movement
Navigation and door mechanisms and everything else you see here.
